actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the erection of an appropriate statue or other memorial on the main approach to the Arlington National Cemetery to honor individuals who were combat glider pilots during World War II.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to erect along the approach to Arlington National Cemetery, Virginia, a statue or other memorial to honor the combat glider pilots of World War II. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the erection of an appropriate statue or other memorial on the main approach to the Arlington National Cemetery to honor individuals who were combat glider pilots during World War II.
